register.reg_condition: when FEAT_TCR2 is implemented and FEAT_AA64 is implemented

purpose_text.para: The control register for stage 1 of the EL1&0 translation regime.

text_before_fields.para: Unless stated otherwise, all the bits in TCR2_EL1 are permitted to be cached in a TLB.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Force non-global for unassured translations using TTBR1_EL1.
This bit is permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: This bit has no effect on the interpretation of the nG bit.
Translations using TTBR1_EL1 are treated as non-global regardless of the value of the nG bit if all of the following is true:

content.para: The translation is for the EL1&0 translation regime.
Stage 1 and stage 2 translation are enabled.
The final stage 1 translation using the descriptor does not have the Assured Translation property.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Force non-global for unassured translations using TTBR0_EL1.
This bit is permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: This bit has no effect on the interpretation of the nG bit.
Translations using TTBR0_EL1 are treated as non-global regardless of the value of the nG bit if all of the following is true:

content.para: The translation is for the EL1&0 translation regime.
Stage 1 and stage 2 translation are enabled.
The final stage 1 translation using the descriptor does not have the Assured Translation property.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Force non-global translations for TTBR1_EL1.
This bit is permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: This bit has no effect on the interpretation of the nG bit.
Translations using TTBR1_EL1 are treated as non-global regardless of the value of the nG bit.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Force non-global translations for TTBR0_EL1.
This bit is permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: This bit has no effect on the interpretation of the nG bit.
Translations using TTBR0_EL1 are treated as non-global regardless of the value of the nG bit.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enable use of two ASIDs.
This bit is permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Use of two ASIDs is disabled.
Use of two ASIDs is enabled.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Disable the Contiguous bit for the Start Table for TTBR1_EL1.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR1_EL1 is not affected by this field.
The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR1_EL1 is treated as 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_D128 is implemented and TCR2_EL1.D128 == 1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Disable the Contiguous bit for the Start Table for TTBR0_EL1.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR0_EL1 is not affected by this field.
The Contiguous bit of Block or Page descriptors of the Start Table for TTBR0_EL1 is treated as 0.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_D128 is implemented and TCR2_EL1.D128 == 1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.
Enables the Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is disabled.
Hardware managed Access Flag for Table descriptors is enabled.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Permit Translation table walk Incoherence.
Permits RCWS instructions to generate writes that have the Reduced Coherence property.
This bit is permitted to be implemented as a read-only bit with a fixed value of 0.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Write accesses generated by RCWS at EL1&0 do not have the Reduced Coherence property.
Write accesses generated by RCWS at EL1&0 have the Reduced Coherence property if HCRX_EL2.PTTWI is 1.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Enables VMSAv9-128 translation system.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Translation system follows VMSAv8-64 translation process.
Translation system follows VMSAv9-128 translation process.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enable Attribute Indexing Extension.
This field is RES1 when TCR2_EL1.D128 is 1.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Attribute Indexing Extension Disabled.
Attribute Indexing Extension Enabled.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enables Permission Overlays for privileged accesses from EL1&0 translation regime.
This bit is not permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Permission overlay disabled for EL1 access in stage 1 of EL1&0 translation regime.
Permission overlay enabled for EL1 access in stage 1 of EL1&0 translation regime.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enables Permission Overlays for unprivileged accesses from EL1&0 translation regime.
This bit is not permitted to be cached in a TLB.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Permission overlay disabled for EL0 access in stage 1 of EL1&0 translation regime.
Permission overlay enabled for EL0 access in stage 1 of EL1&0 translation regime.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Enables usage of Indirect Permission Scheme.
This field is RES1 when TCR2_EL1.D128 is 1.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: Direct permission model.
Indirect permission model.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Protected attribute enable. Enables use of bit[52] of the stage 1 translation table entries as the Protected bit, for translations using TTBRn_EL1.
If bit[52] is used as the Protected bit, it is not used as the Contiguous bit.
This field is RES0 when TCR2_EL1.D128 is 1.
This field is ignored by the PE and treated as zero when any of the following are true:

listitem.content: All of the following are true: EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state. The Effective value of HCRX_EL2.TCR2En is 0.
EL3 is implemented and SCR_EL3.TCR2En == 0.

field_value_description.para: For translations using TTBRn_EL1, bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry is not the Protected bit.
For translations using TTBRn_EL1, bit[52] of each stage 1 translation table entry is the Protected bit.

field_reset_condition.condition: the highest implemented Exception level is EL1

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

access_permission_text.para: When the Effective value of HCR_EL2.E2H is 1, without explicit synchronization, accesses from EL3 using the accessor name TCR2_EL1 or TCR2_EL12 are not guaranteed to be ordered with respect to accesses using the other accessor name.
If FEAT_SRMASK is implemented, accesses to TCR2_EL1 are masked by TCR2MASK_EL1.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
MRS
MSRregister
MRS
MSRregister
